'''''Amon Hen'' 215''' is the two-hundred-and-fifteenth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in [[January]] [[2009]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''The Lady of [[Westmarch]]''
** By: Susanne Stopfel
* Editorial
** By: [[Andrew Butler]]
* Contents
* Artwork: ''No way down''
** By: [[Jef Murray]]
* [[Bywater]] Announcements
** By: Malcolm Lindley
* Announcements
* AGM Announcement
* Seminar Announcement
* [[Oxonmoot]] Announcement
* Advertisement: Moreton-in-Marsh Exhibition
* Advertisement: American Chesterton Society
* Hobbituary: [[Kay Woollard]] ([[Dora Baggins]]) 1924-2008
** By: Denis Bridoux
* Artwork: ''Two Gaffers and a Gammer, West Farthing''
** By: [[Kay Woollard]]
* Disobedience in ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''
** By: Angela Nicholas
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: [[Sally Kennett]]
* Letters
* Review: ''[[Black & White Ogre Country]]''
** By: Andrew Wells
* Advertisement: ''Black & White Ogre Country''
* Review: ''[[The Mirror Crack'd]]''
** By: Carol Brownlow
* Review: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: Myth, Morality and Religion]]''
** By: Hanusia Tkaczyk
* Artwork: ''[[:File:Jef Murray - The Bridge of Khazad-dum.jpg|The Bridge of Khazad-d√ªm]]''
